languages.text: "С Лейры, мира на окраине, в регионе Безбожных звезд. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} как — чем глубже забираешься, тем хуже видно {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикон{/g} и меньше знают про {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. Появление Вольного Торговца — лучшее, что может случиться с тамошними мирами. Да, самое лучшее".

traits.locale_text: "С Лейры, мира на окраине, в регионе Безбожных звезд. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} как — чем глубже забираешься, тем хуже видно {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикон{/g} и меньше знают про {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. Появление Вольного Торговца — лучшее, что может случиться с тамошними мирами. Да, самое лучшее".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

languages.text: “我来自莱拉，异端群星中的外围世界。在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，你走得越深，{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的光芒就越是黯淡，人们对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的了解就越少。如果行商浪人能大驾光临这样的世界，那真的是件好事，最好的好事。”
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: “我来自莱拉，异端群星中的外围世界。在科罗努斯扩区，你走得越深，{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的光芒就越是黯淡，人们对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的了解就越少。如果行商浪人能大驾光临这样的世界，那真的是件好事，最好的好事。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the Koronus Expanse, the deeper you go, the less visible the Astronomican gets and the less people know about the Imperium. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

languages.text: «Leira, un mundo periférico de la región de las Estrellas Paganas. Cuanto más te adentras en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, menos visible es el {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} y menos gente conoce el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. La llegada de un Comerciante Independiente es lo mejor que le puede pasar a uno de esos mundos. No hay nada igual».
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: «Leira, un mundo periférico de la región de las Estrellas Paganas. Cuanto más te adentras en la Extensión de Koronus, menos visible es el {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} y menos gente conoce el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. La llegada de un Comerciante Independiente es lo mejor que le puede pasar a uno de esos mundos. No hay nada igual».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「レイラは異教に歌われし星々にある辺境惑星よ。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}では、深部に行けば行くほど、{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}が目立たなくなり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}について知る人も少なくなる。自由開拓者の登場は、そんな世界にとって最高の出来事なのよ」
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: 「レイラは異教に歌われし星々にある辺境惑星よ。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}では、深部に行けば行くほど、{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}が目立たなくなり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}について知る人も少なくなる。自由開拓者の登場は、そんな世界にとって最高の出来事なのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Leira, eine weit außen liegende Welt in den Sternen der Ungläubigen. Je tiefer man in die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vordringt, desto weniger sichtbare wird das {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} und desto weniger wissen die Leute über das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Die Ankunft eines Freihändlers ist das Beste, was einer solchen Welt passieren kann. Das Allerbeste."
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: "Leira, eine weit außen liegende Welt in den Sternen der Ungläubigen. Je tiefer man in die Koronus-Ausdehnung vordringt, desto weniger sichtbare wird das {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} und desto weniger wissen die Leute über das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Die Ankunft eines Freihändlers ist das Beste, was einer solchen Welt passieren kann. Das Allerbeste."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « De Leira, un monde à la périphérie de la région des Étoiles Athées. Plus on s'enfonce dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, moins l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} est visible et moins les gens connaissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. L'arrivée d'un libre-marchand, c'est ce qui peut arriver de mieux à un monde de ce genre. Croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: « De Leira, un monde à la périphérie de la région des Étoiles Athées. Plus on s'enfonce dans les Étendues de Koronus, moins l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} est visible et moins les gens connaissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. L'arrivée d'un libre-marchand, c'est ce qui peut arriver de mieux à un monde de ce genre. Croyez-moi. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Leira'dan. Küffar Yıldızlar bölgesindeki ücra bir dünyadır. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} derinliklerine ilerledikçe hem {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan'ı{/g} görmek hem de {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'tan{/g} haberdar olanlara denk gelmek zorlaşır. Böyle bir dünyanın başına gelebilecek en iyi şey, oraya ayak basan bir Hür Tacir'dir. Daha iyisi mümkün olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Leira, an outlying world in the Heathen Stars region. In the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the deeper you go, the less visible the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} gets and the less people know about the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The arrival of a Rogue Trader is the best thing that can happen to a world like that. The very best."

traits.locale_text: "Leira, Küffar Yıldızlar bölgesindeki ücra bir dünya. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin derinliklerine doğru ilerledikçe hem {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan{/g}'ı görmek hem de {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'tan haberi olan kişilere denk gelmek zorlaşır. Böylesi bir dünyada görebileceğin en harika şey, dünyana adım atan bir Hür Tacir'dir. Daha iyisi mümkün olmaz."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
